40  CHAPTER 3 RURAL SETTLEMENT AND URBAN SETTLEMENT 
Mind the Gap CAPS Grade 12 Geography
Chapter
3
Rural  
settlement and urban 
settlement
Settlement geography is the study of where people live and the reasons why they 
live where they do. 
If you 
know and understand 
the key concepts on the next 
page, you will be able to answer 
most of the questions in the 
Settlement section of the 
final exam. Make mobile notes 
(instructions are on page x in the 
introduction) and use them to 
learn these key 
concepts.
